summary: All three requested diagnostic changes (camera far plane, red MeshBasicMaterial background sphere, radius=500 inverted geometry with renderOrder/frustumCulled settings) appear implemented in CubeVisualization.tsx. However, the diff also includes additional, unrequested diagnostic/scene changes and non-code metadata edits beyond the scope constraints.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed scene fog settings (sets FogExp2 density to 0.002) as part of SceneSetup diagnostic.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asked to set camera.far=2000 and updateProjectionMatrix; it did not request modifying fog.
Not requested by REQ-1/2/3; could be considered extra diagnostic behavior outside the specified brute-force changes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified extensive post-processing/bloom/renderer clear-alpha setup (EffectComposer, RenderPass, UnrealBloomPass, gl.setClearAlpha(1)) within CubeVisualization.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest non-goals/constraints say to avoid adding new rendering features or unrelated refactors; post-processing changes are not part of the requested brute-force background diagnostic requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified non-requested project metadata/state files (frontend-file-summaries.txt and project_state.json).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requires keeping changes limited to implementing the diagnostic in CubeVisualization.tsx; updating summary/state files is not requested.
